ATLAS ExperimentATWSS Project

Go to the navigation of the ATWSS system

Docs, Documents, Documentation

When working on a big project, like ATWSS, there are always many documents concerning the software, hardware, maintenance and other necessary components, which create a whole. In order to make it easier for the users but also for people, who will maybe work on it later in the process, it is essential to create a full documentation on every step of the way. To make sure everything is clear.

End User Documentation

  • Help Files

    • The usage of the page is very straight forward. All of the components are shown in a user-friendly way, without any complications to them. If you have any problems with the structure of the site, or you have suggestions considering things that should be added to the page, do not hesitate to contact me at any time.

  • Manuals and Web Support

    • To see how to manage the website go to GitHub Documentation
